title: Cardano (ADA) Signals Recovery – Is a Strong Upside Move Ahead?
summary: Cardano's price has bounced back from $0.780, aiming to surpass $0.840. With a strong upward trend, ADA is now trading above $0.8120 and the 100-hourly SMA. Thi

body.raw:
![Cardano (ADA) Signals Recovery – Is a Strong Upside Move Ahead?](https://www.newsbtc.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/cardano-coin-signals-recovery.jpg?fit=750%2C429)

Cardano's price has bounced back from $0.780, aiming to surpass $0.840. With a strong upward trend, ADA is now trading above $0.8120 and the 100-hourly SMA. This recovery signals potential for further gains in the near future.

---

**Original Article:** [NewsBTC](https://www.newsbtc.com/analysis/ada/cardano-ada-signals-recovery-0-84/)

*This article was originally published on [NewsBTC](https://www.newsbtc.com/analysis/ada/cardano-ada-signals-recovery-0-84/) and has been curated for our readers.*
